list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move from one place to another, especially over a small distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I shift the weight back to the other leg
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi chuyển trọng lượng trở lại chân kia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a slight change in position, direction, or tendency.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một sự thay đổi của dư luận

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: one of two or more recurring periods in which different groups of workers do the same jobs in relay.
an ingenious or devious device or stratagem.
